amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Environmental Protection Agency's Gulf of Mexico program by $2.5 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 21 printed in the Congressional Record to redirect $2.5 million in funding for the Environmental Programs and Management.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jindal amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A017) offered by Mr. Jindal.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Jindal amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.
